product.title: ION Audio ION Luxe Adult 4-in-1 Autowrap Airstyler, Ionic Hair Dryer and Curler, 1875 Volts, Black
product.title_excluding_brand: ION Luxe Adult 4-in-1 Autowrap Airstyler, Ionic Hair Dryer and Curler, 1875 Volts, Black
product.description: Elevate your hair styling routine with the ION Luxe Adult 4-in-1 Autowrap Airstyler. Featuring advanced ionic technology, this versatile tool dries hair faster while reducing frizz and flyaways for a radiant shine. The innovative Autowrap technology effortlessly creates stunning waves, curls, and volume, catering to all hair types. With 3 heat settings, 3 airflow settings, and a cool shot, along with interchangeable diffuser and concentrator attachments, you can achieve salon-quality results at home with ease and efficiency.
product.description_html: Elevate your hair styling routine with the ION Luxe Adult 4-in-1 Autowrap Airstyler. Featuring advanced ionic technology, this versatile tool dries hair faster while reducing frizz and flyaways for a radiant shine. The innovative Autowrap technology effortlessly creates stunning waves, curls, and volume, catering to all hair types. With 3 heat settings, 3 airflow settings, and a cool shot, along with interchangeable diffuser and concentrator attachments, you can achieve salon-quality results at home with ease and efficiency.
product.description_full:
Elevate your hair styling routine with the ION Luxe Adult 4-in-1 Autowrap Airstyler. Featuring advanced ionic technology, this versatile tool dries hair faster while reducing frizz and flyaways for a radiant shine. The innovative Autowrap technology effortlessly creates stunning waves, curls, and volume, catering to all hair types. With 3 heat settings, 3 airflow settings, and a cool shot, along with interchangeable diffuser and concentrator attachments, you can achieve salon-quality results at home with ease and efficiency. * Ionic technology dries hair faster, sealing the cuticle to reduce frizz and flyaways, provides radiant shine.
 * Create amazing waves, curls, & volume with revolutionary Autowrap™ technology.
 * Features 3 heat settings, cool shot, 3 airflow settings, diffuser and concentrator
 * Variable temperature settings for all hair types
 * Time saver: simultaneously dry and style
product.description_full_html:
Elevate your hair styling routine with the ION Luxe Adult 4-in-1 Autowrap Airstyler. Featuring advanced ionic technology, this versatile tool dries hair faster while reducing frizz and flyaways for a radiant shine. The innovative Autowrap technology effortlessly creates stunning waves, curls, and volume, catering to all hair types. With 3 heat settings, 3 airflow settings, and a cool shot, along with interchangeable diffuser and concentrator attachments, you can achieve salon-quality results at home with ease and efficiency.
  • Ionic technology dries hair faster, sealing the cuticle to reduce frizz and flyaways, provides radiant shine.
  • Create amazing waves, curls, & volume with revolutionary Autowrap™ technology.
  • Features 3 heat settings, cool shot, 3 airflow settings, diffuser and concentrator
  • Variable temperature settings for all hair types
  • Time saver: simultaneously dry and style

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
